name: Ann of the Narzissenkreuz
desc: A World Quest series following Ann, a tiny oceanid, to rescue "Princess Lyris" who's trapped in Annapausis.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Unlock Requirements</color>
Talk to ??? who is northwest of the underwater waypoint in <color=#ece5d8>Chemin de L'Espoir, Fontaine</color> west of the <color=#ece5d8>Court of Fontaine</color> , or go towards the entrance of <color=#ece5d8>Annapausis</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Starting Locations</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Chemin de L'Espoir, Fontaine</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Annapausis, Fontaine</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Chain</color>
World Quest Series:

customize.name: Ann of the Narzissenkreuz
customize.desc: A World Quest series following Ann, a tiny oceanid, to rescue "Princess Lyris" who's trapped in Annapausis.

customize.name: The Narzissenkreuz Adventure
customize.desc: In Fontaine, where there aren't supposed to be any Oceanids, you meet a tiny Oceanid...

customize.name: The Story of "the Princess" and "the Adventure Team"
customize.desc: You have met many members from the Narzissenkreuz Adventure Team and have worked hard to successfully rescue the "Princess." Now go to the "magical fountain" mentioned by Ann, and board the water entity in mid-air.

customize.name: Ann's Story
customize.desc: Continue onward.

customize.name: Mary-Ann's Story
customize.desc: You have arrived at "the real Annapausis."

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Ann
customize.desc: An Oceanid created by the consciousness of Mary-Ann.

customize.name: Mary-Ann
customize.desc: An Oceanid living in Annapausis. She is a hybrid consciousness Oceanid formed by the merging of Lyris and Mary-Ann Guillotin.

customize.name: Tainted Water-Spouting Phantasm
customize.desc:
Today, with the Oceanids extirpated from Fontaine, strange elemental life forms have appeared in the waters.

It is said that in Egeria's era, the Oceanids often lived alongside humans, and lived in the springs of clear waters dotted across the lands, and through this, they connected the waters of the world. But most died with their god, and for the survivors, the world no longer has any god they recognize.

customize.name: Oceanid
customize.desc:
A life-form created from condensed Hydro elements of incredible purity. Often attached to bodies of water.
It is said that as water bodies become purer, the Hydro elements within grow more abundant, causing the Oceanids to grow more powerful. It is also said by some that Oceanids were once sea creatures from a home far away who carried the fragments of a long-dead god to the many corners of this world. Perhaps they did this so that the love their god held for this world could be spread through the waters to all the land...

customize.name: Treasure
customize.desc:
An old pocket watch.

It has ceased to tick and tock, and its cover cannot be opened.

customize.name: Green Feather Accessory
customize.desc:
Sometimes, this feather has the power to advance a story forward and bring it to an end.

Its appearance itself represents a power that transcends the story.

Old yet well-preserved, it must have been cherished by many people.

customize.name: Jabberwock's Holy Sword
customize.desc: A holy sword that bears a special meaning in a certain story.

customize.name: Holy Blade of Narzissenkreuz
customize.desc:
A holy sword that bears a special meaning in a certain story.

It belongs to no one.

imgDesc.text: Complete the Quest Series to obtain the Avatar
